formulas.name: BuyerComplianceCheckBody
formulas.expression: IF( AND( {!$Record.HexaBPM__Summary__c} = "Compliance Check for Buyers", {!$Record.HexaBPM__Status__r.Name} = "Cleared" ), "Your document check is complete. You may proceed with the next step.", IF( AND( {!$Record.HexaBPM__Summary__c} = "Compliance Check for Buyers", {!$Record.HexaBPM__Status__r.Name} = "Rejected" ), "Your document check was not successful. Please review and resubmit the required information.", "" ) )

formulas.name: UnitTransfercompletedBody
formulas.expression: "Your unit transfer is complete. Thank you for using Live Aldar"

formulas.name: VerificationofBuyerProfileBody
formulas.expression: "Your property transfer has been initiated by the seller. Please proceed with the next steps"
